## Call-outs

There are five types of callouts:  
1. `note`

::: {.callout-note}
Remember to cash-in the $1 million check
:::

2. `tip`

::: {.callout-tip}
If you find a toilet in your dream, don't use it
:::

3. `warning`

::: {.callout-warning}
Don't trust the teacher
:::

4. `caution`

::: {.callout-caution}
Mind the gap
:::

5. `important`.

::: {.callout-important}
This isn't so important
:::
